game.beginning: It was a time of peace in the kingdom of Valendale.  Everyone went about their daily lives, tending to their livestock, or tending to their gardens, and enjoying the spring-like weather of summer, which was in full bloom.
game.ending: The kingdom was prosperous and the people enjoyed their lives, until one fateful day...
game.synopsis: One sunny winter morning, the prince and princess of Valendale set out on their horse towards the northern border of the kingdom.
game.title: Winter's Wanderings
